title: Dataproc - Dataproc templates
abstract:
# Dataproc - Dataproc templates
Use [Dataproc templates on GitHub](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/dataproc-templates) to set up and run Dataproc workloads and jobs.
Templates are provided in the following language and execution environments:
- [Airflow orchestration templates](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/dataproc-templates/tree/main/airflow) : Run Spark jobs from DAGs in Airflow.
- [Java templates](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/dataproc-templates/tree/main/java) : Run Spark batch workloads or jobs on Dataproc Serverless or an existing Dataproc cluster.
- [Python templates](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/dataproc-templates/tree/main/python) : Run PySpark batch workloads on Dataproc Serverless.
- [Notebook templates](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/dataproc-templates/tree/main/notebooks) : Run Spark jobs using Vertex AI Notebooks
